Articles.Content:
If you're a rocket scientist, please read this.

I'm anything but a good rocket designer, but I have a MASSIVE amount of piloting skills. I'd like you to build a rocket that can get me into orbit and back.

REQUIRED FEATURES

Largest size you can make (like a space station without solar panels or docking bays)

Lots o' gas

Parachute

Good maneuvering

3 crew members

Saftey

OPTIONAL FEATURES

Cool exterior

Speed

No mods

The easiest contols possible

If you use any mods for the rocket, please tell me where to get them and how to install them. (I'm new to the game)

Thanks,

Jax885

I have a rocket that will put 70 tons into orbit, but it is very bad at maneuvering until you get into orbit.

Tell me whether you like it or not. Oh and it has enough umph to get to any planet, i've taken it to Jool, Duna and Eve.

Here is what it looks like on the pad: (700+tons)

Its ugly until the SRBs and the upper tanks drop off, they are only there for 30 seconds.

Here is what it lifts to orbit: (72tons)

Edited October 15, 2012 by deskjetser
Here's my submission. I don't know if this is big enough for you, but it should be able to get three Kerbals almost anywhere with some good piloting.
